name: system-designer-electron
description: System Designer, an IDE for designing JavaScript applications driven by the model

scripts.windows: electron-packager ./ --platform=win32 --asar --arch=x64 --ignore="node_modules" --overwrite --icon=Icon.ico --app-copyright "Copyright © 2017 Erwan Carriou" --app-version 1.9.9 --build-version 170630 --win32metadata.FileDescription="An IDE for designing JavaScript applications driven by the model" --win32metadata.ProductName="System Designer" --win32metadata.OriginalFilename="System Designer.exe"
